Name: Honeyshroom Soup Lv.1
Description2$english: One of the most common soups on the dining tables of the seaside city, its warm aroma can calm one's mood.

recipes.Name: Honey Mushroom Soup
recipes.Des:
Crafting results in either products Lv.1 or Lv.2 with a 50% chance.
A warm, comforting soup found on nearly every table in the seaside capital. Its cozy aroma and gentle sweetness are the essence of home.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Found near the massive mechanical ruins at the site of the Andra Landing Battlefield. Looks like tiny umbrellas that protect insects from the weather.
